original_title: ベイビーレイズ伝説の雷舞! -虎虎一番- ～とりあえず生!生!生!生!生!で見てくれ武道館～ 2014.12.18 日本武道館
overview: Babyraids realized their dream of having a solo concert at the legendary Nippon Budokan on December 18, 2014.  Titled “Babyraids Densetsu no Raibu! -Tora Tora Ichiban-“, Babyraids’ first Budokan concert was almost 3 hour 31-song set of the members performing with a 5-piece live band.  [Content List]  (1) Baby Rows  (2) Baby Ambitious!  (3) Level. 1  (4) Bukkake Rock'n Hakkake Roll  (5) Baby Steps  (6) Full Charge ~ Saturday Night  (7) Love is Panic  (8) Special Medley : Saijo ~ Together! Together! Together! ~ Super Nova ~ Christmas Rival ~ Summer Party  (9) Magic Hour  (10) Big ☆ Star  (11) Tiger, Tiger, Tiger!  (12) Gate of the Tiger  (13) Rock on Darling  (14) S. O. K  (15) Charinco idol  (16) Winter Magic  (17) Name of Tears  (18) SMILE  (19) 2years  (20) New World  (21) Michisilbe  (22) Baby Revolution  (23) TIGER SOUL
title: Babyraids Japan - Tora, Tora, Ichiban Live at Budokan
